title: An Act amending Chapter 67 of the Acts of 2008 authorizing the city of Salem to convert 1 annual license for the sale of wine, malt and cordial beverages to be drunk on the premises to an annual license for the sale of all alcoholic beverages to be drunk on the premises

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Cruz of Salem and Senator Lovely, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4662) of Manny Cruz and Joan B. Lovely (with the approval of the mayor and city council) relative to alcoholic beverage licenses in the city of Salem.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure
